queries.transactions: SELECT ?transaction ?amount ?type ?status ?risk WHERE { ?transaction a fin:Transaction . ?transaction fin:amount ?amount . ?transaction fin:transactionType ?type . ?transaction fin:status ?status . ?transaction fin:riskScore ?risk . } ORDER BY DESC(?risk)
queries.violations: SELECT ?violation ?severity ?description ?action WHERE { ?violation a fin:ComplianceViolation . ?violation fin:severity ?severity . ?violation fin:description ?description . ?violation fin:recommendedAction ?action . } ORDER BY ?severity
queries.rules: SELECT ?rule ?name ?regulation ?severity WHERE { ?rule a fin:ComplianceRule . ?rule fin:ruleName ?name . ?rule fin:regulation ?regulation . ?rule fin:severity ?severity . }
